categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Anarq was a Human female Sith officer who served the reconstituted Sith Empire on the Sith capital planet of Dromund Kaas where she sold light armor.

Anarq appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Light Armor Vendor for Imperial players on Dromund Kaas. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, she was removed from the game along with the rest of the Light Armor Vendors.
